members.name: READ_ONLY_SYNC
members.comment: File mapping mode for a read-only mapping of a file backed by non-volatile RAM. The map method throws UnsupportedOperationException when this map mode is used on an implementation that does not support it.

implNote: On Linux, the MAP_SYNC and MAP_SHARED_VALIDATE flags are specified to mmap when mapping the file into memory.

members.name: READ_WRITE_SYNC
members.comment: File mapping mode for a read-write mapping of a file backed by non-volatile RAM. force operations on a buffer created with this mode will be performed using cache line writeback rather than proceeding via a file device flush. The map method throws UnsupportedOperationException when this map mode is used on an implementation that does not support it.

implNote: On Linux, the MAP_SYNC and MAP_SHARED_VALIDATE flags are specified to mmap when mapping the file into memory.
